transcript:
Customer: Haan, hello.
Executive: Ek ek karwa do aap aur aap isko kal ka rakho kal ek baar aap aa jao.
Customer: Theek hai. Inko aapke follow up call to nahi karni padegi?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir. Hello.
Executive: Platima aawaz aa rahi hai? Sir Platima Cables Private Limited se baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay. Haan bolo. Sir main, ji maine sir call isliye kiya tha aapko, hamare paas aapki ek mail ID se mail receive hua tha, info@platimacables.com se. Ki ye number email ID yahan par lagi hui hai aapki, wo galat email ID lagi hui hai.
Customer: Hmm. To haan to ye jo firm hai Platima Cables Private Limited, ye aap hi ki firm hai ya kisi aur ki, kisi aur ki firm hai sir ye?
Customer: Hmm, aap bataiye.
Executive: Sir ye main aapse puch raha hu, ye mere paas mail receive hui hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi, meri nahi hai, meri nahi hai. Main number batata hu wo aap update kar do.
Executive: Jo number dusre hain wo update karne hain na?
Customer: Haan update kar do, mail ID jo mail aayi hai wo aap update kar do. Waha mera employee tha, main waha se chhod chuka hu. Aur unko waise bhi IndiaMART aapka band karana hai, wo bhi aayenge aapka IndiaMART.
Executive: Nahi to wo to unki headache hai na sir, wo chalayenge ya nahi chalayenge. Agar aap nahi waha se join kar do. Waha change kar do. Ye aapki side se change hoga ek baar, ye aapki side se change hoga ek baar main aapko guide karwa deta hu, aapko ek baar aap aa jaiye online.
Customer: Meri taraf se aap aapke paas authority nahi hai aap change kar sako.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi, OTP jaata hai na sir ispe. Aap isliye aapki side se ho jayega to turant ekdum se access kar payenge na wo bhi easily.
Customer: To sir fir main meri taraf se agar karenge to mujhe unse OTP lena padega.
Executive: Kinse?
Customer: Unse jinka number main dalunga.
Executive: OTP pehle aapko apne number pe OTP hoga wo to apna number denge hi denge jinko number aapko primary karna hoga to Sushant ji ka dalna hoga na aapko.
Customer: Sushil ji ka.
Executive: Sushil ji ka haan. Haan na Sushil ji ka dalna hai na bilkul. To Sushil ji aapko OTP de denge, mail ID aap unki filhal mail ID update karwa do unse baat karke ek baar. To aapka unka coordination to hota hai na sir?
Customer: Main bata deta hu jo update karna hai karte rahenge wo apna.
Executive: Haan to aap unka wo karwa dijiye so that main unse baat karke wo cheeze karwa do, unka number wagera karwa do aap. Aapka unka to coordination hota hai na sir?
Customer: Hota hai jaise taise karenge bhai.
Executive: Ji ji. Theek hai main kar dunga.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a mail from wrong email ID.

- Wants to update email ID and phone number.

- Wants to close IndiaMART account.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for the correct email ID.

- Executive explained OTP verification process.

- Executive asked customer to coordinate with Sushil.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- email id, update, otps, coordination
